oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Advisory Tools for Use in Organic Farming
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Peers, David
van Diepen, Pauline
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Advisory tools are an invaluable aid for advisers in providing farmers with the necessary information for analysis and planning of all aspects of the farm. The review of Advisory Tools provides access to and a comprehensive list of all the templates, calculators and analytical tools available to organic advisers, covering the nutrient managment, business, soils and animal husbandry.
The review identifies relevant research and development, the tools developed and draws on farm and advisory experience of using advisory tools, The review summerises the tools available for advisors providing a brief description of the tool and its use.
